help-file.title: OUTCAST
help-file.content:
Players are outcasted from hometowns for many reasons. If you are an outcast in a city it means you will not be "well liked" if you go there. The guards will hunt you down and kill you. Outcasting is permanent and can NOT be reversed. Some reasons for being outcasted are:
* Race: Some hometowns are not accepting of other races.
For example: ALL RACES except Grey Elves, Half-Elves and Centaurs are considered invaders to Charing and will be killed on sight.
